confirmation.staticMessage: Are you sure you want to

footer.footerDesc: We're a team of gaming enthusiasts and developers passionate about bringing the thrill of case opening to your screen. Our platform combines the excitement of chance with top-tier design and fair mechanics to deliver a casino-style experience like no other

FAQ.p: If you have any questions to which you didn't find the answer for, ask our helpful community on Discord or send us a support ticket. We're here to help!
FAQ.a1:
WOW!Dropbox is an online platform offering mystery boxes, each containing a guaranteed prize. Simply register, choose a box, make a payment, and open it. Once opened, you'll see the prize you've received and can request shipping.
Prizes include products from leading brands such as Apple, Samsung, Rolex, Chanel, Nike, Supreme, and more — at a significantly reduced price.
FAQ.q2: What kind of prizes can I get?
FAQ.a2:
Each box contains a prize that matches its theme. Possible prizes include: smartphones, laptops, designer clothing, accessories, luxury watches, collectibles, and even trips.
Our collection is regularly updated, so there's always something new to discover.
FAQ.a3: Yes. We use a provably fair algorithm that ensures equal chances for every user. Prize probabilities are transparent and public. Your personal data is protected, and payments are processed through certified providers using secure encryption.
FAQ.a4: Absolutely. All products are sourced directly from brands or their official resellers, ensuring authenticity and quality.
FAQ.a5: Yes, every prize is brand new and factory sealed. We do not offer refurbished or used items.
FAQ.a6:
Once you confirm your prize, it will be processed and shipped to your address.
Delivery takes 3 to 15 business days, depending on your location. You will receive a tracking number by email once the item is shipped.
FAQ.a7: We ship to most countries worldwide. If you're unsure whether we deliver to your region, feel free to contact our support team — we'll gladly clarify the details.
FAQ.a8:
You can pay for boxes using Visa or MasterCard through the secure Stripe payment system.
All transactions are processed in euros (EUR), and your bank may automatically convert the currency if needed.
FAQ.q9: How can I track my order?
FAQ.a9:
Once your prize has been shipped, you'll receive an email with a tracking number. If you don't see it, please check your spam folder.
You can also contact us via the chat on our website or by email to get updated shipping details.
FAQ.a10:
If you have any questions or need assistance, you can:

Email us at info@wowdropbox.eu

Use the live chat feature on our website — we're fast, helpful, and happy to assist.
FAQ.q11: Can I cancel my order or get a refund?
FAQ.a11: Once a box is opened, refunds are not possible, as the prize has already been revealed. However, if there was a technical issue or a delivery problem, please contact us — we'll review your case individually.
FAQ.a12: You must be 18 years or older to use WOW!Dropbox. By registering, you confirm that you meet this age requirement.
FAQ.a13: Yes. We comply with privacy regulations and process your data in accordance with applicable laws. Your personal information is never shared with third parties without your consent.

S&R.heading: Shipping & Refund
S&R.p1: Whalepartners OÜ (reg. no. 14674044, VAT EE102141508), the owner of the wow!dropbox website (www.wowdropbox.eu), establishes the following rules for the delivery and return of physical goods obtained by the User when opening a surprise box (Dropbox). The Company delivers goods to the User's specified address and ensures compliance with the conditions described below. The Company's office address is Tornimäe 5, 10145 Tallinn, Harju County, Estonia. For delivery and return inquiries, the User may contact us at info@wowdropbox.eu.

deliveryTerms.p1: Delivery is provided only for physical goods won by the User when opening a Dropbox. To arrange delivery, the User must specify the full postal address and confirm the shipment through the wow!dropbox website interface. The User is responsible for the shipping cost unless free shipping is offered. The shipping cost is calculated automatically based on the item's dimensions, weight, destination country, and the chosen shipping method. The final shipping amount is automatically determined and charged to the User (under the same conditions and using the same payment methods as the purchase of the Dropbox itself).

shippingTimelines.p1: Shipping times may vary depending on product availability, order processing, and other factors. Once the Company has all necessary shipping information, it will make efforts to inform the User of any significant changes in delivery times and to expedite the shipment. The Company will strive to ensure prompt delivery to the address specified by the User.

customs.p1: For deliveries to countries outside the European Union, customs duties, import taxes, and other fees may be collected in the destination country. These charges are not included in the price of the goods or the delivery cost and must be paid by the recipient (User) to the customs authorities or carrier. The User should familiarize themselves in advance with their country's customs regulations regarding the import of foreign goods. The Company is not responsible if, due to national legislation, the import of the product into the User's country is restricted or prohibited. If necessary, the User may request from the Company information about the country of dispatch to estimate potential customs costs.

ownership.p1: Ownership of the goods passes to the User at the moment the goods are handed over to the carrier for delivery to the specified address. Until that moment, the goods remain the property of the Company. The risk of accidental loss or damage to the goods passes to the User only after the goods have been actually received by the User (or their authorized representative) at the delivery address. Until the goods are transferred to the User, including during transportation, the Company is responsible for their preservation. If the User independently selects a carrier or shipping method that has not been approved by the Company, the risk of accidental loss or damage to the goods passes to the User once the goods are handed over to that carrier.

rightToCancel.h1: Right to Cancel and Return Goods
rightToCancel.p1: The User has the right to unpack and inspect the goods as is permissible in a regular store, in order to ensure their integrity and characteristics.

returnCondition.p1: If the goods have been used beyond the necessary minimum for inspection (for example, if there are obvious signs of use, scratches, damage, or missing components), the Company has the right to reduce the refund amount proportionally to the diminished value of the goods. In cases of significant damage or loss of the goods' commercial appearance, the return may be entirely refused (for example, if the product has lost its entire value).

exceptions.h1: Exceptions to the Right of Return
exceptions.p1: According to applicable law, the following goods cannot be returned within the 14-day period:
l1: Used or Damaged Goods. If the product shows signs of use that impair its commercial appearance, the Company may refuse the return or reduce the refund amount.
Sealed Hygiene Products. Sealed personal hygiene products, cosmetics, perfumes, and similar items cannot be returned if their packaging has been opened.
Custom Orders. Products made to the User's individual specifications or clearly personalized (for example, bearing the user's name or unique designs) cannot be returned.

refundPolicy.p1:
After receiving the returned goods (or confirmation of their dispatch), the Company will refund the amount paid. The Company will make the refund no later than 14 calendar days from the date of receiving notice of the return. However, the Company reserves the right to delay the refund until it actually receives the goods or confirmation of their dispatch by the User.

The refundable amount includes the price paid for the product and the original delivery cost (if this was charged separately). Any additional costs incurred due to the User choosing a more expensive delivery method are not refunded. The refund will be made using the same payment method that was used for the order, unless the parties agree otherwise. The User will not incur any penalties or additional charges for making the return in a timely manner.

PF.p: You can run this code in Node.js or use any online JavaScript playground like JSFiddle or CodePen to independently verify any previous roll. This ensures complete transparency and fairness in every WinBox opening.
